full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA MO GLUD RDZONGS 'PHRAL SKYEN PHYIR BZLOG GDON BGEGS TSAR BCOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (ZHES SOGS DANG BZLOG PA BYA, DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'DI NI RANG RANG SKAL NYAMS LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR MA MO GLOD RDZONGS RGYAS PA RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSDUS, SDUS RNAMS LAS CUNG ZAD BSNAN TE, CHOS RJE THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CANG BDAG GIS BSGRIBS PA LA SPYAN LDAN MKHAS PA RNAMS PA BZOD PAR GSOL, YI GE PA NI AU LEM CE PI LIG THU DGE SLONG 'JAM DPAL LO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, BKRA SHIS, MANGGA LAm, ,)
